title: Bug 19089 - No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: Bug 19089 - No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
OB: When using the Photon version of the Java editor, the expected popup menu does not appear when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler.
EB: The Java editor in Photon should display a popup menu when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler. This menu allows users to add breakpoints, marks, and perform other related actions.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1) Open a Java editor.
2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler.

The expected behavior is that a popup menu should appear, but it does not.
